cleaned_text: Experience the centering power of essential oils with the Perfect Balance Essential Oils Set. Contains 5 oils that unlock the body and mind: - Clearing Essential Oil Blend 5ml - Focus Essential Oil Blend 5ml - Pure Energy Essential Oil Blend 5ml - Bliss Essential Oil Blend 5ml - Deep Calming Essential Oil Blend 5ml Comes in beautiful presentation packaging with info guide - makes an ideal gift.
